(ROOT
  (SINV
    (S
      (NP (EX There))
      (VP (VBP are)
        (ADJP (RB very) (JJ few))))
    (VP (VBZ places)
      (NP (DT that) (NNS specialises))
      (PP (IN in)
        (NP (NN Beef))))
    (NP (NNP Hor) (NNP Fun))
    (. .)))


expl(are-2, There-1)
dep(places-5, are-2)
advmod(few-4, very-3)
acomp(are-2, few-4)
root(ROOT-0, places-5)
det(specialises-7, that-6)
dobj(places-5, specialises-7)
prep(places-5, in-8)
pobj(in-8, Beef-9)
nn(Fun-11, Hor-10)
nsubj(places-5, Fun-11)


(ROOT
  (S
    (PP (VBN Come)
      (PP (TO to)
        (NP
          (NP (VB think))
          (PP (IN of)
            (NP (PRP it))))))
    (NP (DT this))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP (DT the) (JJ only) (NN one))
      (SBAR (IN that)
        (S
          (NP (PRP I))
          (VP (VBP know)
            (PP (IN of))))))
    (. .)))


prep(one-10, Come-1)
pcomp(Come-1, to-2)
pobj(to-2, think-3)
prep(think-3, of-4)
pobj(of-4, it-5)
nsubj(one-10, this-6)
cop(one-10, is-7)
det(one-10, the-8)
amod(one-10, only-9)
root(ROOT-0, one-10)
mark(know-13, that-11)
nsubj(know-13, I-12)
ccomp(one-10, know-13)
prep(know-13, of-14)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (NNP Most) (NNP Beef) (NNP Hor) (NNP Fun))
      (PP (IN in)
        (NP (NNP Singapore))))
    (VP (VBP are)
      (VP (VBN served)
        (PP (IN by)
          (NP (NNP Cze) (NNP Char) (NNS places)))))
    (: ;)))

nn(Fun-4, Beef-2)

  (S
    (S
      (NP (EX There))

          (NP (CD one) (NNP Beef) (NNP Hor) (NNP Fun) (NN stall))
          (PP (IN in)
            (NP (NNP Singapore))))))
    (CC and)

      (NP (PRP it))
      (VP (VBZ is)
        (VP (VBN located)
          (PP (IN at)
            (NP (NNP Golden) (NNP Mile) (NNP Food) (NNP Centre))))))
    (. .)))

    (ADVP (RB even))
    (VP (VBD demonstrated)
      (NP (PRP$ his) (JJ flambe) (NN technique))
      (PP (IN for)
        (NP (DT the) (NN photoshoot))))
    (. !)))


nsubj(demonstrated-3, He-1)
advmod(demonstrated-3, even-2)
root(ROOT-0, demonstrated-3)
poss(technique-6, his-4)
amod(technique-6, flambe-5)
dobj(demonstrated-3, technique-6)
prep(demonstrated-3, for-7)
det(photoshoot-9, the-8)
pobj(for-7, photoshoot-9)


(ROOT
  (NP
    (NP (RB Almost) (DT the) (JJS best) (NN Beef))
    (NP (NNP Hor) (NNP Fun) (, ,))))


advmod(Beef-4, Almost-1)
det(Beef-4, the-2)
amod(Beef-4, best-3)
root(ROOT-0, Beef-4)
nn(Fun-6, Hor-5)
dep(Beef-4, Fun-6)


(ROOT
  (SINV
    (ADVP (RB just))
    (VP (VBZ needs))
    (NP (DT a) (JJ little) (NN tweaking))
    (. .)))


advmod(needs-2, just-1)
root(ROOT-0, needs-2)
det(tweaking-5, a-3)
amod(tweaking-5, little-4)
nsubj(needs-2, tweaking-5)
